input.message:
Your project **Galvanised steel touch-up system** (proj_centralsteel_galvanised_touchup) for CentralSteel Engineering is missing someone responsible for Quality Assurance.

The current team consists of:
- You (Lead)
- An Engineer
- Ops support

There is no QA role assigned to this project. You may want to consider adding a quality assurance team member to ensure proper validation and testing of the touch-up system.
